overview: James is trying to reconcile the relationship between him and his sister after their parents pass away but is reluctant on going to The Church of Life where she is now spending most of her time. After going back and forth about whether to go or not with his friend Michael, James eventually decides to go, leading him to have strange encounters with a few people.
tagline: A church, long lost siblings. The true meaning of sacrifice.
title: Bring Us Together
